name: rainier_showcase
description: Dramatic mountain terrain lighting preset - sun offset from camera by 90° with reduced IBL fill for strong relief and shadows
notes: Sun azimuth (45°) is offset ~90° from camera phi (135°) to create dramatic side-lighting that emphasizes terrain relief. IBL is reduced to 0.2 to prevent shadow fill. cam_theta=55 gives 35° elevation above horizon for a low-angle view.
